name: Mercury
description: Hot, rocky, part molten, and so close to the sun that Icarus's wings would've melted before he ever took off. A testament to both humanities' truly stupid obsession with expansion for the sake of expansion and to the willingness of Humanity to put millions in suffering if money is on the line, Mercury exists now as a slave industrial colony for any and all debtors. Surrounded by hundreds of armed drones, preventing any unauthorized escape.
